casebody.data:
No. 10-6263. Terrick Terrell Nooner, et al., Petitioners v. Ray Hobbs, Director, Arkansas Department of Correction. 562 U.S. 1031, 131 S. Ct. 569, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 8714.

178 L. Ed. 2d 417,

November 8, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 594 F.3d 592.
